title: T4 Elbow Seal Replacement
purpose: Replace the elbow rotary seal to correct leakage.

steps.title: Isolate and clean
text: Isolate hydraulic supply and bleed pressure.
Clean the elbow exterior to keep debris out.

steps.title: Remove old seal
text: Remove cover screws and expose the seal cavity.
Pick out the seal carefully to avoid scratching the bore.

steps.title: Install new seal
text: Lubricate the new seal lightly and press it evenly into place.
Reinstall cover and torque fasteners per spec.
notes: Use torque values from the T4 torque cheat sheet.
Log part number used; update maintenance record.
